img_above_text:
There's not much else to loot around the large stone pagoda where you fought Non-Able, so now is a good time to head back to the Forest of Felicity Shrine, and make your way through the canyon where the Frog Guai boss was to enter the next optional area.
## Towers of Karma
img_below_text:
The large forested field beyond the Forest of Felicity's canyon is fairly wide open, and as you exit the canyon you'll find a few small trails leading to the right, left and straight ahead.
![Wukong Karma 2.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/23/Wukong_Karma_2.jpg)

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showcasing a snowy forest environment. The character, likely Wukong, is traversing through the snow-covered terrain, equipped with a large staff. This setting follows the narrative progression from the Forest of Felicity Shrine, moving through a canyon where a boss battle occurred, leading to an expansive field with multiple trails. The image serves to illustrate the transition to a new area, emphasizing exploration and the game's atmospheric design.
